Talk_Ready_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What? <sp:5:1:0>I found this ore deposit, so I'm
gonna smash it and get the <clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>inside!
Talk_Ready_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>The rain's making my hands all slippery,
so I can't get a good grip. Otherwise this
rock would be dust by now.
Talk_Success_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>How?<sp:5:1:0> HOW?<sp:5:1:0> I was joking when I said to
break it in one go!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I came up short because I was only using
my arm muscles. But you?

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>You used your brain muscles!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Now all I can do is admit that you won.
Congratulations. That was a perfect strike.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>The <clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>are yours, like we agreed.
And you've inspired me to get more
creative with my weapon designs!
Talk_Ready_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0900>What's with that look?! You don't think
I can do it?!

Fine, then! Let's make it interesting!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you can break this ore deposit in <clr:0000>one
strike<clr:ffff>, I'll give you all the <clr:0000>gems<clr:ffff> that
come out.
<snd:LaughL_01>So step up...if you've got the GUTS.<sp:5:1:0>


I'm pretty confident in my skills, but with
my <clr:0000>sword<clr:ffff>, I can't even make a dent.

There's no way a nobody like you can
break it in <clr:0000>one strike<clr:ffff>.
Talk_Warning_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>How?<sp:5:1:0> HOW?<sp:5:1:0> I was trying so hard to break
it in one go! <sp:5:0:0>But you actually did it!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700>This ore deposit fell down from Death
Mountain. I was really hoping to keep
its <clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>for myself.
But you're the one who got them out,
so I'll let you keep them.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>At least I got to see that perfect strike.
I'll have to get more creative with my own
weapon designs!
Talk_Ready_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>My hands are a little sweaty, so my grip's
not as firm as usual. Otherwise I'd have
busted it by now.
Talk_TryToDestroy_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I thought you had it for a second.
But maybe breaking it in <clr:0000>one strike<clr:ffff>
just isn't possible.
Hey, that's all right. No need to look so
bummed out.

I couldn't break it with my <clr:0000>sword <clr:ffff>no
matter how many times I hit it, and I'm
a sword master.
<snd:TalkPositive>I like your grit. Even though you know
it's impossible, you still want to try.

If you ever want to give it another shot,
let me know.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I say that, but of course, soon I'll have
smashed this ore deposit myself. Those
<clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>will be mine!
Talk_Warning_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I found this ore deposit, and I'll be the
one who busts it open! Those gems will
be mine!
Talk_TryToDestroy_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I almost thought you'd do it this time...
Guess it just isn't possible to break that
thing in <clr:0000>one swing<clr:ffff>.
I couldn't break it with my <clr:0000>sword <clr:ffff>no
matter how many times I hit it, and I'm
a sword master.
<snd:TalkPositive>But I'm liking the determination. If you
ever want to try again, just give me
a shout.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I say that, but of course soon I'll have
smashed this ore deposit myself. And the
goodies inside will be mine!
Talk_TryToDestroy_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>I gotta ask. Are you OK being out at night
like this?<sp:0:4:0>Doesn't bother me since I'm such a
sword master, but nighttime's dangerous.
It's when the monsters come out.
No shame in going back to the inn if
you're scared.
Talk_TryToDestroy_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>If you can break this ore deposit with
<clr:0000>one strike<clr:ffff>, I'll give you all the <clr:0000>gems <clr:ffff>that
come out.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
I'm pretty confident in my skills, but with
my <clr:0000>sword<clr:ffff>, even I can't make a dent.

There's no way a nobody like you can
break it in <clr:0000>one strike<clr:ffff>.
